key.name: show-toolbar
key.description: Whether Bedit should display the toolbar (containing shortcut buttons) at the top of the screen.

key.name: show-menubar
key.description: Whether Bedit should display the menubar at the very top of the screen.

key.name: show-statusbar
key.description: Whether Bedit should display the statusbar at the bottom of the screen.

key.name: show-overview-map
key.description: Whether Bedit should display a mini map of the document at the side of the screen.

key.name: word-wrap
key.description: Whether Bedit should soft-wrap lines that go beyond the edge of the visible area.

key.name: highlight-selection
key.description: Whether Bedit should highlight areas that match the current selection.

key.name: auto-check-spelling
key.description: Whether Bedit should check files for spelling errors in real time.
